alert.note: Alert for Hermosa Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 23 at 1:38PM MST until December 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West downslope winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...The Hermosa Foot Hills. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The high winds may damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.
